title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin praises Jerry Jones for a surprising roster move he made and why this shows Dallas could be moving into a different space among the NFL elites. He explains why it’s not crazy to think Aaron Rodgers could end up with the Steelers after this season with the Packers. He reacts to the Bears officially naming rookie Justin Fields their starting quarterback going forward.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
